Class ReferralPathFinder

java.lang.Object
ReferralPathFinder
public class ReferralPathFinder extends Object
Uses Dijkstra's algorithm to find the shortest weighted path for a student trying to get a referral at a given company

  • Method Details

    • findReferralPath

      public List<UniversityStudent> findReferralPath(UniversityStudent start, String targetCompany)
      Finds the shortest weighted path between a starting student and any student who has interned at a given company
      Parameters:
      start - The student to begin the search from
      targetCompany - The company to search for
      Returns:
      A path from the starting student to a student with an internship at the company
